h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: The biggest attack he performs is one where he whips up a load of papers into a tornado that will follow you around the temple. You can dodge this or run away from it, but he'll use it as cover at times to get closer to you. Toward the end of this move, the papers will start to fall and there's an opening where he doesn't move much at all. This is the perfect moment to Immobolize him or dash over to attack as much as you can.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Boss - Non-Void'.
The content is as follows:
The biggest attack he performs is one where he whips up a load of papers into a tornado that will follow you around the temple. You can dodge this or run away from it, but he'll use it as cover at times to get closer to you. Toward the end of this move, the papers will start to fall and there's an opening where he doesn't move much at all. This is the perfect moment to Immobolize him or dash over to attack as much as you can.
